title: Tesla Inc. stock rises Thursday, still underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        -2.25%
       rallied 1.36% to $197.41 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 2.96% to 16,041.62 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 1.18% to 39,069.11. This was the stock's second consecutive day of gains. Tesla Inc. closed $101.88 short of its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (92.1 M) remained 17.6 million below its 50-day average volume of 109.7 M.
